::: callout-note
#### Neurodevelopmental Cell Annotation Transformer

Machine learning transformer trained on neurodevelopmental datasets to annotate cell-types spanning regions and gestation weeks.
:::

### Highlights

-   Input GEX or gene activities
-   Output neurodevelopmental cell-type predictions

### Tech

-   Quarto, Shiny (or Streamlit), Python
